column4: Hello is there an ubuntu hardware channel or I can ask my question here?
I have a brand new dell inspiron 1545 and I use it as a desktop (10h a day) with the battery in(it's a 6 cell battery) what I should do...take it out or leave it in?
I've heard people talking that you should remove the battery and charge it...once a month...this way you will save some battery life...
take the battery out when on guaranteed AC power.
